page.title: 19"40-40"-a childrens' game.
page.content: Choose a tree or post as a base.One player is "it".He closes his eyes and counts to forty while the others hide.When he has counted to forty,he shouts,"Coming,ready or not." No players should be behind the base or next to it.The person who is"it"then goes to look for the other players.They have to get to the base without the person who is "it" seeing them. Immediately a person who is not "it" touches the base he shouts,"Forty-forty save myself."The person who is "it" runs back to the base if he sees someone,touches it and shouts,"Forty- forty I see...."(naming the person who has been seen.). The last player has to try to get back to the base without being seen and shout,"Forty- forty save all." If he suceeds then the person who was "it" is "it" again.
